TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ma’olaway, title = Ma’olaway, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ma’olaway} }

S.FORM: Ma'olaway Itiniay i Donghe Cen no Taitung ko Ma'olaway a niyaro', 135 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 319 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 31 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 100 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 69 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 219 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis27 , Bunun1 , roma3 . Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
